name: Empowered Mining
description: Enhances Energetic Harvesting with additional Mining effects. 1 Harvest Pip: Gain Empowered Mining increasing Mining by 5% while Perceptive Harvest is active. 2 Harvest Pips: Gain Perceptive Mining which increases Spot Weakness: Ore by 5% while Perceptive Harvest is active. 3 Harvest Pips: Increases Stamina restore amount by 4. 4 Harvest Pips: Gain Heightened Mining increasing the effectiveness of any Energetic Harvest, Perceptive Harvest, and Stamina restore effects gained in the next 7 seconds when Heightened Harvest is active. 5 Harvest Pips: Gain Furious Mining increasing the Harvest Base Damage: Ore by 30 for 6 seconds or 2 hits, whichever comes first when Furious Reaping is active.
